flawed_nl_solution:
The hunting season last 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 months
So he goes hunting 3*6=<<3*6=18>>18 times a year
That means he gets 18*2=<<18*2=36>>36 deers per year
So he catches 36*600=<<36*600=2160>>2160 pounds of deer a year
That means he keeps 2160/2=<<2160/2=1080>>1080 pounds of deer a year
#### 1080

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21600, not 2160. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
